content.welcome: The mayor of this fictional neighbourhood wants to implement new smart city ideas. Experience how these ideas might impact the neighbourhood by exploring your surroundings and listening to your neighbours. If you find a person with a question mark on top of their heads... feel free to interact with them.

friction.description: Smart city ideas | Pigeons can reduce access to public services

content.before: Sensing pigeons have been sent troughout the city to monitor waste flows. The city wants to become a zero-waste municipality within 2 years. The pigeons collect data and transmit information to each other. Besides, they nudge citizens to reduce their household waste. You have the opportunity to decide how pigeons will use data to nudge citizens to reduce waste and plastic consumption. In this case, when individual waste goes beyond a pre-determined limit, pigeons introduce a sludge (a delay or burden) for people to access public services like public transport or healthcare.

a.content: When individual waste goes beyond a pre-determined limit, pigeons introduce a sludge (a delay or burden) for people to access public services like public transport or healthcare.

content.before: Hello there! So much going on, eh? I have just opened a café in this neighborhood. My first enterpreneurial adventure. Would you like to pass by? My carrot pie is probably the best one you have ever tried!

after.c: You know, I am all in for sustainability and for having a zero-waste city... But so many customers are bringing their own reusable take-away containers. They say they are afraid that they won't be able to use the public healthcare when they need it. I used to spread the word about my business by branding my cups and even spent a lot of money on these cardboard ones...

content.before: Do you know any interesting places I should visit? I am just passing by, exploring the surroundings. I heard there is an interesting painter working nearby.

after.c: If you are looking for a café, go to that one in the corner. They serve coffee in these nice cups that are recyclable. Funny though, the owner of the café seemed so grumpy! People here don't want her cups anymore so she says she's missing out on new business...

content.before: Are you here for the conference? Quite interesting that they have chosen this place this year, don't you think? I live right there, next to the fountain, and I was part of the development of "Max the cat", the AI companion. Have you heard about it?

after.c: I had a terrible toothache last week and desperately tried to make an appointment with my dentist. He checked my waste record though and said he couldn't give me an appointment until next month... What am I going to do?
